imgDinamica: This is a dynamically generated image!
markdownShortcutHint: Hint: use Ctrl+Enter to force rendering.
markdownSupportList: Support for lists, links, and code
contextMenuDesc: Right-click the element below to open available actions.
operationalLabIntro: Here you can test the main user-facing features: Markdown editing, image generation, and contextual actions.
markdownLabDesc: Write Markdown and instantly see server-rendered output. You can copy both the rendered preview and the generated HTML.
markdownPreviewDesc: Server-rendered preview, useful to immediately validate real parser behavior.
markdownHtmlDesc: Final HTML generated by the parser, ready to reuse or integrate.
imageBuilderDesc: Create a dynamic image by changing content and core canvas settings.
imageTextControlsDesc: These controls manage text content, font, size, and text color.
imageCanvasControlsDesc: These controls manage image background and width.
contextMenuHint: Use right click to access quick actions that can be reused in other template areas.
internalsIntro: This section shows built-in internal features: theme, languages, API, and asset resolution.
internalsThemeDesc: Theme color is centralized and reused consistently across the interface.
internalsLanguageDesc: Language switching uses template translation files and updates the interface immediately.
internalsApiDesc: API connection status and active endpoint currently used by template calls.
apiPlaygroundDesc: Test a real API social call with a dynamic filter.
assetResolverDesc: Resolve an asset by its ID and verify the generated link.
accessibilityDesc: Centralized colors via CSS variables and automatic text-contrast calculation.
i18nDesc: Language switch works through querystring with frontend and backend translations.
apiReadyDesc: Gateway, keys, middleware and async-call helpers are already included.
